tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ReturnsAndExchanges (
    return_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT NOT NULL,
    customer_id INT NOT NULL,
    return_reason TEXT,
    return_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Exchanges (
    exchange_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    original_order_id INT NOT NULL,
    new_order_id INT NOT NULL,
    product_id INT NOT NULL,
    exchange_reason VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Returns (
  return_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_id INT,
  return_date DATE,
  reason_code INT,
  notes TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Products (
  product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_name TEXT,
  category TEXT,
  price DECIMAL,
  inventory_count INT
)

CREATE TABLE Customers (
  customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_name TEXT,
  email TEXT,
  address TEXT,
  phone_number TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Orders (
  order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  order_date DATE,
  total_amount DECIMAL,
  status TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE ReturnsReasons (
  reason_code INT PRIMARY KEY,
  reason_description TEXT,
  resolution TEXT
)
